name: Cast Curator
description: Automatically organize your library by cast and crew members.
overview: Automatically organize your library by cast and crew members.

name: Studio Curator
description: Automatically organize your library by studio.
overview: Automatically organize your library by studio.

name: Privacy Mode
description: Adds a privacy mode that hides content when activated.

name: Remote Trailers
description: Enables playback of remote trailers from any source.
overview: Enables playback of remote trailers from any source.

name: Watch History Janitor
description: Cleans up the "Continue Watching" history after a specified time period.
overview: Cleans up the "Continue Watching" history after a specified time period.
